p: Selenium supplementation is an important strategy for inhibiting wrinkles, because it can reverse ultraviolet light damage and play an anti-ageing role in the skin [ 89, 92]. Kim et al. showed that a selenium-rich tuna heart extract enhanced collagen synthesis and promoted the proliferation of skin fibroblasts, thus having anti-ageing and anti-wrinkle effects [ 93]. These studies indicate that Se supplementation could be a new strategy for combating skin ageing and photoaging.
